mapper.insert: INSERT INTO receiving_table ( RCV_COUNT, RCV_STATUS, RCV_NUMBER, RCV_ID, RCV_DATE, QUANTITY, RCV_MANAGER_ID, RCV_SUPERVISOR_ID, RCV_REMARKS, ORD_NUMBER, COMPANY_CODE, RCV_PRICE, ORD_DATE ) VALUES ( #{RCV_COUNT}, #{RCV_STATUS}, #{RCV_NUMBER}, #{RCV_ID}, #{RCV_DATE}, #{QUANTITY}, #{RCV_MANAGER_ID}, #{RCV_SUPERVISOR_ID}, #{RCV_REMARKS}, #{ORD_NUMBER}, #{COMPANY_CODE}, #{RCV_PRICE}, #{ORD_DATE} )
